mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TASKGROUP ( seq, group_name, description, manager_id, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( TaskGroup_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{group_name}, #{description}, #{manager_id}, SYSTIMESTAMP, systimestamp )
mapper.select: SELECT g.seq AS seq, g.group_name AS group_name, g.manager_id AS manager_id, g.description AS description, rm.name AS manager_name FROM TaskGroup g JOIN TaskGroupMember m ON g.seq = m.group_seq JOIN member rm ON g.manager_id = rm.id WHERE m.member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TaskGroupMember (seq,group_seq, member_id, role, created_at) VALUES (TaskGroupMember_SEQ.nextval, #{group_seq}, #{memberId},#{role}, SYSTIMESTAMP)
